WorkItem.Description: Specifically I believe the spell cost reduction is not being utilized by rawr. editing the value does not affect the trinket value, nor do any of the mps of spells/cycles change. In previous versions there were no issues with it.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Shard of Woe trinket not properly calculated

Comments.Message: Are you sure it's not just you having tons of extra mana so the spell cost reduction doesn't matter? We need your character file to verify.

Here is the character file, and to clarify I found this when i noticed the trinket was being ranked lower then i expected, then changed the 405 cost reduction to the proper 205, and the trinket value did not change.
There is a special exception in code that if it sees 405 mana reduction it changes it to 205 to handle this specific trinket.
Well, that solves the issue then.
